Dariush Talagi sentenced to life for murder of Sione Tuuholoaki on Auckland Central’s Queen St https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nz/crime/dariush-talagi-sented-to-life-for-for-for-murder-for-sione-tuuholoakiaki-on-auckland-centrals-centrals-centrals-centrals-queen-st/562corletfh3hd222222snacbzwmyq/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nz/crime/dariush-talagi-sented-to-life-for-for-for-murder-for-sione-tuuholoakiaki-on-auckland-centrals-centrals-centrals-centrals-queen-st/562corletfh3hd222222snacbzwmyq/ Craig KapitanCCTV clearly shows anger and reckless bravado, the judge said at the shooter's sentencing. Thu, 10 Apr 2025 05:00:00 +0000 Dariush Talagi has been handed a life sentence after the execution-style murder of Sione Tuuholoaki on Auckland Central's busy Queen St in August 2023. Talagi fled the scene on an electric scooter and remained on the run for over three months. Photo / Supplied
